snippet: A boulder from a mountain smashed into a train in the French Alps, killing two passengers and injuring several others.
abstract: Two people are killed and nine injured when enormous boulder smashes into and derails tourist train in French Alps.
lead_paragraph: A boulder from a mountain smashed into a train in the French Alps, killing two passengers and injuring several others.

headline.main: 2 Die as Boulder Hits French Train
headline.print_headline: 2 Die as Boulder Hits French Train
